title: TRTC Guwahati Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 05 Administrative and Store Assistant Posts
description: The Tool Room & Training Centre Guwahati (TRTC Guwahati) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Procurement Consultant, Administrative Assistant, Placement Coordinator,  and Store Assistant Jobs. The interested applicants can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Post-graduation,  B.E./B. Tech, MBA, and Diploma holders can apply for the TRTC Guwahati Recruitment 2025 . Th...
